name: The Last Stand (Sten4321, andr4376, Chimaron, chasoe)
name_original: The Last Stand (Sten4321, andr4376, Chimaron, chasoe)
description:
Play as one of three combat vehicles as you fight to protect your base from endless hordes of enemies. Place towers and collect different weapons to keep the growing tide of enemies at bay. How long can you survive?

You can fight alone, or play local multiplayer with a friend.
